00018 #ifndef CO_CONNECTIONTYPE_H
00019 #define CO_CONNECTIONTYPE_H
00020 
00021 #include <co/base/debug.h>
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 
00024 namespace co
00025 {
00027     enum ConnectionType
00028     {
00029         CONNECTIONTYPE_NONE = 0,
00030         CONNECTIONTYPE_TCPIP,     
00031         CONNECTIONTYPE_SDP,       
00032         CONNECTIONTYPE_PIPE,      
00033         CONNECTIONTYPE_NAMEDPIPE, 
00034         CONNECTIONTYPE_IB,        
00035         CONNECTIONTYPE_UDP,       
00036         CONNECTIONTYPE_MULTICAST = 0x100,
00037         CONNECTIONTYPE_MCIP = CONNECTIONTYPE_MULTICAST, 
00038         CONNECTIONTYPE_PGM,       
00039         CONNECTIONTYPE_RSP        
00040     };
00041 
00042     inline std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os,
00043                                        const ConnectionType& type )
00044     {
00045         switch( type )
00046         {
00047             case CONNECTIONTYPE_TCPIP:
00048                 os << "TCPIP";
00049                 break;
00050 
00051             case CONNECTIONTYPE_SDP:
00052                 os << "SDP";
00053                 break;
00054 
00055             case CONNECTIONTYPE_PIPE:
00056                 os << "ANON_PIPE";
00057                 break;
00058 
00059             case CONNECTIONTYPE_NAMEDPIPE:
00060                 os << "PIPE";
00061                 break;
00062 
00063             case CONNECTIONTYPE_IB:
00064                 os << "IB";
00065                 break;
00066 
00067             case CONNECTIONTYPE_UDP:
00068                 os << "UDP";
00069                 break;
00070 
00071             case CONNECTIONTYPE_MCIP:
00072                 os << "MCIP";
00073                 break;
00074 
00075             case CONNECTIONTYPE_PGM:
00076                 os << "PGM";
00077                 break;
00078 
00079             case CONNECTIONTYPE_RSP:
00080                 os << "RSP";
00081                 break;
00082                 
00083             case CONNECTIONTYPE_NONE:
00084                 os << "NONE";
00085                 break;
00086 
00087             default:
00088                 EQASSERTINFO( false, "Not implemented" );
00089                 os << "ERROR";
00090                 break;
00091         }
00092         return os;
00093     }
00094 }
00095 
00096 #endif // CO_CONNECTIONTYPE_H
